Web Presence Upgraded

Aug 11, 2009

After a few years of blogging on WordPress.com, I got my own web space and migrated the content to it.  This move will help me integrate a portfolio site, manged through CargoCollective.com, and exercise greater control over the design.  Full functionality and content upload for both the blog and portfolio site will be complete in late September.
